Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.god

Class BuildBeforeWorkerMove

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.god.GodDecorator
it.polimi.ingsw.model.god.MoveTwice
it.polimi.ingsw.model.god.BuildBeforeWorkerMove
All Implemented Interfaces:
God
public class BuildBeforeWorkerMove
extends MoveTwice
This class implements the ability to build before the worker move: you can build, move a worker at the same level or lower, and then build again.
